title: Treatment of Exports in the EU CBAM
author: Antonio Fernandez
text: Treatment of Exports in the EU CBAM 18 March, 2022 AUTHOR(S): Andrei Marcu, Michael Mehling, Aaron Cosbey, Alexandra Maratou, Anita Vollmer This new report examines one of the most critical issues in the current political debate on the EU’s Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM): the treatment of exports. Exports are currently not covered by the European Commission’s CBAM proposal. However, there are concerns that the exclusion of exports will open-up an export-related carbon leakage channel, thereby harming EU competitiveness and climate ambition. In this report, ERCST presents its recommendations on how to address exports in the EU CBAM. Download the Policymaker Summary here.
